title: Mahadevi
summary: Mahadevi (Sanskrit: महादेवी, IAST: Mahādevī), also referred to as Devi, Shakti, Adi Parashakti and Adi-Shakti, is the primordial Goddess or Divine Mother - The Supreme Energy who possesses all riches, all strength, all fame, all beauty, all knowledge, all renunciation and is the Creatrix of the universe in Hinduism.  Shaivas and Shaktas consider her as Parvati,[1] and Vaishnavas consider her as Lakshmi
